summary.Title: Part-time job as a distributor
summary.Presentation:

We are looking for people above the age of 18 who want an extra income and can offer you a flexible part-time job where you st

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Then distributing marketing materials may be something for you.

We are looking for people above the age of 18 who want an extra income and can offer you a flexible part-time job where you still have time for your studies.

In addition, the job will be close to your home address. Your job will be to deliver marketing materials to the right mailboxes.

We deliver the marketing materials packed and ready for distribution at your place of residence. If you are interested and meet the requirements, we would love to hear from you.

You can send your application to job@all-recruit.dk and if you have any questions about the job, you can call our colleague Nicklas Johansen on tel.: 20 89 43 40.

About you:

  • You are flexible, reliable and stable
  • You are interested in working outdoors
  • You have a Danish social Security number (CPR number)
  • You live in one of the following postal codes 2200-3500, 4000-4800, 7000, 8700, 8200, 8000 or 7100

We offer:

  • Good salary, up to DKK 150 / hour
  • 4-15 hour working week
  • An opportunity to work extra during your holidays
  • Flexible working hours
  • Off on weekends

We are always looking for distributors - therefore you are always welcome to send us your application. We are looking forward to hearing from you. All Recruit is a temp and recruitment agency with offices in Hvidovre and Herning, which recruits and delivers temps to several large companies in Denmark.
